meta.title: Work for the Future | Home
meta.description: Work for the Future is a social project helping young people choose their career path through interviews with professionals from various industries on TikTok.
meta.keywords: career, career choice, career path, professional interviews, tiktok, professions, professionals, exempt from theory

hero.title: Work for the Future
hero.subtitle: Explore different career paths through conversations with professionals

features.title: Our project
features.subtitle: We help young people choose their career path

interviews.title: Interviews with professionals
interviews.description: We talk to people from various industries to show what their daily work looks like

inspiring.title: Inspiring content
inspiring.description: We create short, engaging materials that can inspire you to discover new professional opportunities

community.title: Community
community.description: We build a community of young people who want to consciously develop their careers

tiktokPreview.title: Our latest TikToks
tiktokPreview.subtitle: See what work looks like in different industries

featured.title: Choose your career path
featured.description: On our TikTok profile, we regularly publish interviews with professionals from various industries. Learn what their daily work looks like, what skills are needed, and how to start a career in your chosen field.
featured.note: Follow us to stay updated with new materials and discover diverse professional development opportunities!

cta.title: Support our project
cta.description: Follow us on social media to discover new professions and get inspired for conscious career planning. We regularly publish new interviews and content!

youtube.title: Project summary
youtube.subtitle: Watch a video presenting the results of our work and the project's impact on young people's career choices
youtube.completionMessage: Thank you to everyone who supported our project and contributed to its success!
